start.text: You wake up in a dark hospital, a flickering light revealing bloodstained walls. A note on your chest reads: '3 hours before they come.' What do you do?

bed.text: You peek under the bed... a pair of eyes blink at you, then vanish into the shadows.

note.text: The note says: 'Don't let them hear you breathe.' A chill runs through your asshole.

door.text: The door's locked. You hear faint footsteps outside. The handle shakes slightly.

lockpick.text: Your paperclip snaps. You hear breathing behind you.

turn_around.text: You turn... a figure stands in the corner, watching you and masturbating.. But the lights go out.

hallway.text: The hallway is dark. An exit sign flickers, but stairs lead deeper into the dark.

exit.text: You reach the exit. A key unlocks the door. But something watches you from the shadows.
